utilities
Class DB_Access

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--utilities.DB_Access
public class DB_Access
extends java.lang.Object

Overview
This class is used to gain access to a MS Access Dbase. This class can either be used to create an object with a connection member or you can use the static method Open_ODBC_Connection to return a reference to a connection.

Field Summary
private  java.sql.Connection Dbase_Con
           
 
Constructor Summary
DB_Access(java.lang.String DBName)
          Store the DB connection as a private member of this object
